is directly across the lake from here. Hardy Falls is a short walk (wheelchair accessible) up the Deep Creek canyon to a modest waterfall. The creek may be full of salmon in September and October.

The Gaust Haus in Peachland is a very good German Style restaurant.  Try the Veal!
